<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">

        <number>SNSCRIPT0001035</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
	if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
		return;
	}
	
	var rec = new GlideRecord ('incident');
	rec.addQuery('cmdb_ci',g_form.getValue('cmdb_ci'));
	rec.query ();
	if (rec.next() ) {
		alert (rec.number);
	}
	
}</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>Client Script</script_type>
        <short_description>Obtain record of different table based on user in current record</short_description>
